page.title: 18Houses in our area.
page.content: We conducted a local survey by sending questionnaires to each household in the Stiperstones and Snailbeach area. We discovered these statistics about types of houses in the area.{22%}are semi-detached{34%}are detached houses {28%}are detached bungalows{16%}are extensively rebuilt cottages.There are so many detached properties because the area has developed slowly since the mining days, with only in-filling taking place occasionally.We have also discovered that{48%}of the houses are brick- built,{34%}are stone-built,{11% are stone and brick-built and{7%}are timber.{58%}of the houses were built during this century.But{42%}are more than{80}years old.An interesting point is that{45%}are built all or partly of local stone. This suggests that local stone was readily available and probably free.
